modName: tavern soverngard song audio replacer mod
summary: A audio replace for the tavern the song is called Soverngard comes I have been give full permission by the author to use his music for this mod.  note: this is compatible with other tavern audio replacers.
descriptionHtml:
this is an audio replace for the tavern... enter any tavern to active the mod.

WATCH THE VIDEO TO SEE THE SONG

[b]install:[/b] just drag and drop or use Nexis mod manager.

[u][b]IMPORTANT NOTES:[/b][/u]  if you don\'t want this to play every time you enter a tavern or if you are using one of the other audio replaces for the tavern.  When it asks if you want to overwrite the file, click yes for one of the files. there will be a 50% or 25% chance of it activating then.

declaimer: I have full permission from the author of his song.

download on itunes:

http://itunes.apple.com/ie/album/level-1/id491253649

[b]future notes:[/b]  make this song playable outside.  make this playable in Whiterun.

Sorry guys I can\'t for the love of me figure out how to get the comment\'s to work It keeps telling me the comment\'s are locked for some reason.
author: Colin
